captions.text:
Hi guys! I'm Laura Vitale, and today we are
making a really fun treat. Now it's not really

a recipe and I really debated showing this
but I had so many people requesting it and

I kinda got the nudge from Joe, my husband
to just go ahead and do it so I figured I'd

do it because it's just been highly requested
and that is an oreo milkshake. Now I know

it's easy but with the summer months coming
up and the warmer months ahead I figured this

is a really fun cold treat that you can treat
yourself to your kids, your family, your friends

whoever you have over! The recipe is only
going to require a handful of ingredients

starting with some oreo cookies of course,
vanilla and chocolate ice cream, and a little

bit of milk. So let's get started. I'm going
to start in my blender now this is the part

where a lot of people go wrong. When you go
ahead and make your milkshake what you don't

want is to let your machine run for a super long
time because that will make everything just

really really sort of liquidy and watery,
because the more it runs, the more the ice

cream melts, and just becomes a mess. So what
you do is you just pulse this until you have

your desired consistency. Just going to add
a little touch of milk. Pop the lid on and

I'm just going to pulse this a few times until
I got my desired consistency. And that is

perfect for me. Look at that. Now if you want
yours chunky, by all means make yours a little

bit chunkier, but the problem with that is..It gets
stuck in your straw! That is thick enough

for the straw to stand completely on its own
I mean look at that..but it is thin enough

that I can enjoy it. Mmmm... Without worrying
about it getting stuck in my straw.

I will have the written recipe, the written amounts
that I use, and that I always use to make

my oreo milkshake I will have them written
on Laurainthekitchen.com I hope that you have

found this helpful, I hope that you've enjoyed
it because so many of you have been requesting

it! Let me know what milkshake you want to
see next because you know I read all of your

comments! And I will see you next time, bye
guys!

title: Oreo Milkshake Recipe - Laura Vitale - Laura in the Kitchen Episode 749
